name: T-Mission
description:
2 player co-op space adventure game made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018

Gamepad:
Left Joystick to move
Right Joystick to shoot

Keyboard:
WAD or Arrow to Move
Mouse aims
Left Mouse button to shoot

Radar:
In all control modes, the RADAR is passive and should help the ship survive  :)

Objective:
Find all Batteries that have been scattered around space.  Destroy ships and gather some ore from passing asteroids.
